main.name: Web Developer
main.description: I am a Java Full Stack and MERN Stack Developer specializing in building dynamic and scalable web applications.
main.bio: I am a Java Full Stack and MERN Stack Developer with strong experience in building modern, high-performance web applications. My expertise includes React and Node.js on the front end and Spring Boot and Express.js on the back end. I am committed to leveraging modern technologies to create efficient, user-centric, and impactful digital solutions.

address.street: Opposite Partap Fuel Pump Vill Allahabad

resume.skillmessage: Here I can create a short write-up of my skills to show off to employers

education.description: Grapse skills in Data Structures and Algorithms, Java Programming , problem solving and Web technologies
Grapse skills in english communication skills, presentation skills, and problem solving

work.title: Mern Developer - Backend/Frontend
work.description: Worked at Blueberry Groups on the company internal website handling Payroll, HRMS, Employee Attendance & Leaves, Course Assignments, and related modules. Involved in both application design and backend development, ensuring seamless functionality and data management across multiple modules and workflow workflows.

work.title: Java Developer - Backend/Frontend
work.description: Developed applications using React for frontend and Spring Boot for backend, contributing to a project related to Transport for London services. Designed and implemented LARA, an application that monitors tasks related to road accidents, generates appeals based on specific incidents, and facilitates submission of those appeals to the court.

work.title: Online Mern Stack Internship
work.description: During my internship, I gained comprehensive knowledge and hands-on experience in various modern web development technologies and frameworks. Developed dynamic web applications using React.js. Learnt about building server-side applications with Node.js. Implemented and managed databases using MongoDB.
